verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Adhikaaramu pondi yuntivi prabhoo Paralokamandunu bhoomi meedanu neevu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Annitilo natyadhika jayamu nonduchunnaamu Manala preminchina Yesu kristu prabhuvu Dwaaraane kanula kaguparachina vijayamuna Kai sannuthinthumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Viswasinchu manayandu thana shakhtini Goorchi aparimithamaina prabhaavamunu Yerigiyunnaamu thirigilechina prabhuvunu Choochi harshinchedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manala balaparachu prabhuvunandu balamu Nonduchu prabhunakimpaina kaaryamulanu Cheyuchuntimi thanadu punarudhaana balamunu Pogedada mepudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristu maranamulo samaanaanubhavamu Kaligiyu kasta nastamulalo paalivaaramaguta Yerigiyu aatma praana shareeramulatho Aaraadhintamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manala stiraparachina shakhtigala devuniki Thanadu priya putrudu Yesu kristu dwaaraane Thanaku nirathamubunu mahima ghanatha Halleluya amen{/lang-eng}
